name: Simplistic Dream
description:
*WARNING - LOUD MUSIC* Description:

Simplistic Dream is a 2D Platformer game where you play as Belle Delphine in one of her dreams. In this dream, she's in a candy world where she has to collect all of the bath waters scattered throughout the map, although it won't be that simple. There are also crazy followers (simps) that are looking for her and if they touch her she instantly dies unless she smashes them. 

Look out for the last one though...

Features:
  • A gameplay focused singleplayer platformer with collectibles and enemies;
  • Smash your enemies for your path to victory
  • A fantasy candy world friendly to everyone
  • Easy controls for better experience
  • One mistake and you'll have to restart the level
CONTROLS: Keyboard:

ENTER to start the game;

Use the arrow keys/WASD to move;

Space to jump;

Z to skip the dialogues/win/game over screens.

Controller:

Start (Older Controllers)/Options to start the game; 

Arrow keys to move;

X(Playstation) or A(Xbox) to jump;

O(Playstation) or B(Xbox) to skip dialogues/win/game over screens.

Smartphone:

Start to start the game; 

Arrow keys to move;

B to jump;

A to skip dialogues/win/game over screens.

The Team:

Game Developer: André Amaro

Game Artist: Luis Sebastião

Game Designer: Ana Cristina
